General.Name: Moura Dubeux Engenharia S.A
General.Description: Moura Dubeux Engenharia S.A. provides real estate development services in Brazil. It engages in the purchase and sale of properties; rental and split of land allotment; real estate construction of properties; and management and administration of own or third parties real properties. The company develops flats, hotels, resorts, and residential buildings; and offers technical construction management and advisory services to the condominiums, as well as engineering services. Moura Dubeux Engenharia S.A. was founded in 1983 and is based in Recife, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Engenheiro Domingos Ferreira, 467, Recife, PE, Brazil
